body:
Hello

I am here to clear up the confusion with my ranks as we only got Junior Map Dev on Sunday (about 48 hours ago) and we already have Map Dev and also we have both ranks.

The reason for this is that Barney and I have been building most of the tournament maps and we would like to test them on MapDev when possible. We can not Set Next with junior and test these maps. 

I hope that this clears up the confusion - do not congratulate us yet ;p

Thank you

title: Clearing up  BmB and my ranks

replies.body: the double rank looks so op
